titleStmt.title: Apocalyptical mysteries, touching the two witnesses, the seven vials, and the two kingdoms, to wit, of Christ, and of Antichrist, expounded. Wherein is contained some things necessary for the saints in this present generation to know ... By H.K. a servant of Jesus Christ.
titleStmt.author: Knollys, Hanserd, 1599?-1691.

notesStmt.note: In three parts. Each part has special t.p. and separate pagination.
Reproduction of original in: University of Chicago Library.
